description.english: Complete "L.A. Meltdown" on any difficulty.
description.brazilian: Complete "Ataque em L.A." em qualquer dificuldade.
description.french: Terminer "Fusion à L.A." en n'importe quelle difficulté.
description.german: Schließe "Chaos in L.A." auf beliebiger Schwierigkeitsstufe ab.
description.italian: Completa "Distruzione di L.A." a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà.
description.japanese: いずれかの難度で「L.A. メルトダウン」を完了させる。
description.russian: Пройдите «Разборка в Лос Анджелесе» на любом уровне сложности.
description.spanish: Completa "Colapso en L. A." en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Complete "Lunar Apocalypse" on any difficulty.
description.brazilian: Complete "Apocalipse Lunar" em qualquer dificuldade.
description.french: Terminer "Apocalypse lunaire" en n'importe quelle difficulté.
description.italian: Completa "Apocalisse lunare" a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà.
description.japanese: いずれかの難度で「ルナ・アポカリプス」を完了させる。
description.russian: Пройдите «Лунный Апокалипсис» на любом уровне сложности.
description.spanish: Completa "Apocalipsis lunar" en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Complete "Shrapnel City" on any difficulty.
description.brazilian: Complete "Cidade de Estilhaços" em qualquer dificuldade.
description.french: Terminer "Shrapnel City" en n'importe quelle difficulté.
description.italian: Completa "Città di piombo" a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà.
description.japanese: いずれかの難度で「シュラプネル・シティ」を完了させる。
description.spanish: Completa "Ciudad metralla" en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Complete "The Birth" on any difficulty.
description.brazilian: Complete "O Nascimento" em qualquer dificuldade.
description.french: Terminer "Naissance" en n'importe quelle difficulté.
description.german: Schließe "Die Geburt" auf beliebiger Schwierigkeitsstufe ab.
description.italian: Completa "La nascita" a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà.
description.japanese: いずれかの難度で「生誕」を完了させる。
description.spanish: Completa "El nacimiento" en cualquier dificultad.

displayName.japanese: 帰ってきたぜ、ベイビー

description.english: Complete "Alien World Order" on any difficulty.
description.brazilian: Complete "Ordem Mundial Alienígena" em qualquer dificuldade.
description.french: Terminer "Domination extra-terrestre" en n'importe quelle difficulté.
description.german: Schließe "Außerirdische Weltordnung" auf beliebiger Schwierigkeitsstufe ab.
description.italian: Completa "Ordine del Mondo Alieno" a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà.
description.japanese: いずれかの難度で「宇宙人の世界秩序」を完了させる。
description.russian: Пройдите «Инопланетный строй» на любом уровне сложности.
description.spanish: Completa "Orden alienígena mundial" en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Step on 40 enemies after using the Shrinker on them.
description.brazilian: Pise em 40 inimigos depois de usar o Encolhedor neles.
description.french: Marcher sur 40 ennemis après avoir utilisé le minimiseur sur eux.
description.german: Tritt auf 40 Gegner, nachdem du sie mit der Schrumpfkanone beschossen hast.
description.italian: Schiaccia 40 nemici dopo averli rimpiccioliti con il Riduttore.
description.japanese: シュリンカーで縮小した40人の敵を踏み潰す
description.russian: Растопчите 40 врагов, предварительно обработав их Уменьшителем.
description.spanish: Pisa a 40 enemigos después de dispararles con la reductora.

description.english: Step in a pile of excrement.
description.brazilian: Pise em um monte de excremento.
description.french: Marcher dans une pile d'excréments.
description.italian: Pesta degli escrementi.
description.japanese: クソの山に足を踏み入れる
description.spanish: Pisa un montón de excrementos.

displayName.japanese: ケツを振りな、ベイビー

description.english: Tip an exotic dancer.
description.brazilian: Dê uma gorjeta para uma dançarina exótica.
description.french: Donner un pourboire à une strip-teaseuse.
description.italian: Paga una spogliarellista.
description.japanese: ストリッパーにチップを渡す
description.spanish: Dale propina a una bailarina exótica.

displayName.russian: О-о-ох, у-у-ух, ну и где оно?

description.english: Find 70 secret areas.
description.brazilian: Encontre 70 áreas secretas.
description.french: Trouver 70 zones secrètes.
description.italian: Trova 70 aree segrete.
description.japanese: シークレットエリアを70箇所見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra 70 zonas secretas.

displayName.brazilian: Esses vermes alienígenas vão pagar caro
displayName.italian: Quei vermi degli alieni devono pagare
displayName.japanese: エイリアンのウジ虫どもに思い知らせてやる
displayName.spanish: Esos malditos alienígenas me las pagarán

description.english: Finish the "Hollywood Holocaust" level in under 3 minutes.
description.brazilian: Termine a fase "Holocausto em Hollywood" em menos de 3 minutos.
description.french: Terminer le niveau "Holocauste à Hollywood" en moins de 3 minutes.
description.german: Beende das Level "Hollywood-Massenvernichtung" in weniger als 3 Minuten.
description.italian: Completa il livello "Olocausto a Hollywood" in meno di 3 minuti.
description.japanese: 3分以内に「ハリウッド・ホロコースト」を完了する。
description.russian: Пройдите уровень «Голливудский Холокост» менее, чем за 3 минуты.
description.spanish: Completa el nivel "Holocausto en Hollywood" en menos de 3 minutos.

description.english: Kill 1000 enemies.
description.brazilian: Mate 1.000 inimigos.
description.french: Tuer 1 000 ennemis.
description.italian: Uccidi 1000 nemici.
description.japanese: 敵を1000人倒す
description.spanish: Mata a 1000 enemigos.

description.english: Kill every enemy on a level.
description.brazilian: Mate todos os inimigos de uma fase.
description.french: Tuer tous les ennemis d'un niveau.
description.german: Töte alle Gegner in einem Level.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i nemici in un livello.
description.japanese: このレベルの敵を全員を倒す
description.spanish: Mata a todos los enemigos de un nivel.

description.english: Use a cheat code.
description.brazilian: Use um código de trapaça.
description.french: Utiliser un code de triche.
description.italian: Usa un codice cheat.
description.japanese: チートコードを使う
description.spanish: Usa un código de truco.

description.english: Find the Doomguy in the Level "Death Row".
description.brazilian: Encontre o Doomguy na fase "Corredor da Morte".
description.french: Trouver le Doomguy dans le niveau "Couloir de la mort".
description.german: Finde den Kerl aus Doom im Level "Todestrakt".
description.italian: Trova il soldato di Doom nel livello "Via della morte".
description.japanese: 「死刑囚監房」でドゥームガイを見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra a Doomguy en el nivel "Corredor de la muerte".

description.english: Find Luke in the Level "Lunar Reactor".
description.brazilian: Encontre Luke na fase "Reator Lunar".
description.french: Trouver Luke dans le niveau "Réacteur lunaire".
description.italian: Trova Luke nel livello "Reattore lunare".
description.japanese: 「ルナ・リアクター」でルークを見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra a Luke en el nivel "Reactor lunar".

description.english: Find a secret area.
description.brazilian: Encontre uma área secreta.
description.french: Trouver une zone secrète.
description.italian: Trova un'area segreta.
description.japanese: シークレットエリアを見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra una zona secreta.

displayName.japanese: そのしかめツラは何だ？

description.english: Find Sam in "Mirage Barrage".
description.brazilian: Encontre Sam na "Barragem de Miragem".
description.french: Trouver Sam dans "Barrage Mirage".
description.italian: Trova Sam a "Sbarramento Miraggio".
description.japanese: 「ミラージュ・バラージ」でサムを見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra a Sam en "Descarga milagrosa".

displayName.japanese: 吸い込みはしなかった

description.english: Use the hookah in High Times.
description.brazilian: Use o narguilé em"Altas Horas".
description.french: Utiliser le houka dans "Le bong moment".
description.italian: Usa il narghilè in "Un po' di sballo".
description.japanese: 「ハイ・タイムズ」で水パイプを使う。
description.spanish: Usa la cachimba en "Un bong momento".

displayName.french: Moi aussi je peux être coriace !
displayName.japanese: ほらな、俺だってタフだ！
displayName.russian: Ха-ха, я слеплен из стального теста!

description.english: Finish any level on "Damn, I'm Good" difficulty.
description.brazilian: Termine qualquer fase na dificuldade "Como sou bom".
description.french: Terminer n'importe quel niveau en difficulté "Je suis trop fort".
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges Level auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe "Bin verdammt gut" ab.
description.italian: Completa un livello qualsiasi alla difficoltà "Sono troppo forte".
description.japanese: いずれかのレベルを「さすが俺様」難度で完了する。
description.russian: Пройдите любой уровень в режиме «Я чертовски хорош».
description.spanish: Termina cualquier nivel en dificultad "Pero qué bueno soy".

displayName.english: I Never Knew This Was Here
displayName.brazilian: Não tinha ideia de que isso estava aqui
displayName.french: Je n'ai jamais su que c'était là
displayName.japanese: これがここにあったとは
displayName.russian: Я и не знал, что это тут
displayName.spanish: No sabía que esto estuviera aquí

description.english: Find any secret level.
description.brazilian: Encontre qualquer fase secreta.
description.french: Trouver n'importe quel niveau secret.
description.italian: Trova un livello segreto.
description.japanese: いずれかのシークレットレベルを見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra un nivel secreto.

description.english: Listen to Developer Commentary (Use at least one trigger).
description.brazilian: Escute o Comentário do Desenvolvedor (Use pelo menos um ativador).
description.french: Écouter les commentaires des développeurs (utiliser au moins un déclencheur).
description.german: Hör dir den Entwicklerkommentar an (löse mindestens einen Kommentar aus).
description.italian: Ascolta il commento dello sviluppatore usando almeno un grilletto.
description.japanese: デベロッパーコメンタリーを聞く（最低、1トリガーを使う）
description.russian: Послушайте комментарии разработчиков (запустите минимум один триггер).
description.spanish: Escucha comentarios del desarrollador (usa al menos un activador).

displayName.japanese: タバコがあるなら吸ってもいいぞ

description.english: Use the Incinerator
description.brazilian: Use o Incinerador.
description.french: Utilisez l'incinérateur.
description.italian: Usa l'inceneritore.
description.japanese: 焼却装置を使う。
description.spanish: Usa el incinerador.

description.english: Burn 50 bad guys to death.
description.brazilian: Queime 50 inimigos até a morte.
description.french: Carboniser à mort 50 méchants.
description.italian: Uccidi 50 nemici dando loro fuoco.
description.japanese: 50人の悪党を焼き殺す。
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos quemándolos.

description.english: Kill a Firefly Trooper while it's flying small.
description.brazilian: Mate um Soldado Vaga-lume enquanto ele estiver voando baixo.
description.french: Tuer un soldat luciole qui vole en rase-mottes.
description.german: Töte einen Libellenkämpfer im Flug, wenn er klein ist.
description.italian: Uccidi un soldato lucciola mentre vola basso.
description.japanese: 小さくなって飛んでいるホタルトルーパーを1人倒す
description.russian: Прикончите Боевого светляка, пока он мелкий.
description.spanish: Mata a un firefly trooper mientras vuela bajo.

displayName.brazilian: Mais de 2 armas ao mesmo tempo?
displayName.french: Plus de 2 armes en même temps ?

description.english: Carry all weapons with ammo at once.
description.brazilian: Carregue todas as armas com munição de uma vez só.
description.french: Porter toutes les armes à munitions en même temps.
description.german: Besitze gleichzeitig alle Waffen mit Munition.
description.italian: Trasporta tutte le armi con le munizioni contemporaneamente.
description.japanese: 弾薬の入った武器をすべて同時に持つ。
description.russian: Таскайте на себе скопом все пушки и арсенал.
description.spanish: Lleva todas las armas con munición a la vez.

description.english: Kill 5 bad guys with one shot.
description.brazilian: Mate 5 inimigos com um tiro.
description.french: Tuer 5 méchants d'un coup.
description.german: Töte 5 Gegner mit nur einem Schuss.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 nemici con un colpo solo.
description.japanese: 1発で5人の悪党を倒す
description.spanish: Mata a 5 enemigos de un solo disparo.

description.english: Kill 10 bad guys in 10 seconds while on steroids.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 inimigos em 10 segundos sob o efeito de esteroides.
description.french: Tuer 10 méchants en 10 secondes en étant sous stéroïdes.
description.german: Töte auf Steroiden 10 Gegner in 10 Sekunden.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 nemici in 10 secondi mentre sei sotto steroidi.
description.japanese: ステロイドが効いている間、10秒間で10人の悪党を倒す。
description.russian: Накатив стероидов, прикончите 10 врагов за 10 секунд.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos en 10 segundos bajo el efecto de esteroides.
